Positive_Review: Always greeted with a smile comfortable quiet room more than adaquate breakfast Excellent position to both the tourist destinations and local shopping

Great hotel We were last year and come back this year also for one night being in transit to Croatia Superb location cleanliness staff breakfast One of the best hotel we have been We recommend to everyone

The courtesy of the staff Nice private SPA Great location walking distance from many attractions museums palace etc close to shopping fashion supermarkets many restaurants Staff gave great restaurants recommendations Reasonable price

Negative_Review: Room a bit small Air conditioning very feeble Breakfast expensive at 20 Euro per person so we went elsewhere
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff Comfortable room and bed Nice friendly atmosphere good location would return

Gorgeous hotel in a great location The staff were friendly and very helpful with awesome recommendations of places to go The rooms were a good size and the amenities excellent The little extra details made this an awesome weekend away

Negative_Review: Hotel needs a facelift We stayed there several years ago and it was quite nice then No carpeting on the stairwell may be in the process of replacing Breakfast was included last time but not this time so really wasn t good value for the money Bed was too soft
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The noise from outside the property at night meant it was difficult to get a good nights sleep especially bad on Friday and Saturday nights The breakfasts at 20Euro each was too expensive a very adequate breakfast was bought at a local bakery with tables for 5Euro each
Positive_Review: The hotel location was very central and in easy walking distance of the main attractions The hotel was also close to a U Bahn station which was convenient

Negative_Review: Nothing it was fine and hunky dory
Positive_Review: A no fuss place clean bright and well fitted out All the staff were very friendly and helpful In a very good position for touring Vienna we would highly recommend this hotel

We had a wonderful stay in Hotel das Tyrol mind you the entrance is not on the Mariahilferstrasse 15 but just before the corner in the small side street called Konigs Klostergasse The very high ratings for this hotel are very deserved indeed It really is a very nice hotel with wonderful art inside at every floor The double room was great with a view over the roofs at the back of the hotel on the 4th floor I guess all rooms are very nice but I would probably favour those at the back 15 25 35 45 55 or 65 Breakfast was very good and besides all kinds of things you can order a hot breakfast too It s location is very central close to the main musea the opera house and a bit further the Belvedere The staff are just exemplary they did their utmost in advising us were we might find some of the very nice porcelain art displayed all over the hotel We also took the opportunity to relax in the sauna steam room downstairs which we had to ourselves see the really beautiful and perfectly kept sea aquarium We will most certainly be back as two nights the most of three days is really to short to visit Vienna Thanks to all the wonderful staff
Reallly friendly and helpful staff special mention to Norbert Super quiet room and very fluffy pillows We loved it Quirky Donald Duck paintings were an unexpected touch

Negative_Review: Can t think of anything bad about this hotel
Positive_Review: Nice boutique hotel right next to the Museum Quarter Every staff member we met was very friendly They took the extra steps to help us enjoy our time in Vienna be it providing local knowledge or restaurant bookings Excellent facilities and very quiet at night One of the highlights of the hotel is the small booklet with many restaurant recommendations We followed it during the 6 days stay and it never failed

Excellent location close to museums shops restaurants Also close to public transport which helps you see all of Vienna Hotel is full of interesting art works was very well presented breakfast was really good too

Negative_Review: The pillows were far too squishy and had trouble with the temperature of the room the duvets were so thick and made us feel so hot all night On check in we totally misheard the receptionist and thought breakfast was included was charged an absolute fortune at the end of the stay although some days we only came to the breakfast room for a glass of juice I think we had too higher expectations for the hotel from all the amazing reviews we read online it didn t quite blow us away and we found it to be totally fine but totally average
Positive_Review: Hotel was spotless our bedroom and bathroom was incredibly clean Loved the little spa you could book all to yourselves Room amenities were good Hotel was in a very central location Very christmassy feel to the hotel over the holiday period

The hotel is located in a really nice shopping area Everything I wanted to see was within walking distance or accessible by public transit The staff was very friendly and gave me no trouble about trying to check in early The room was ready and the keys given with a smile They also gave great restaurant recommendations and info on the Christmas Markets The hotel is nicely decorated clean and the rooms are very comfortable The breakfast buffet served is of good quality and selection

Negative_Review: TBH the Pound exchange rate meant it was more expensive than when I first booked but Brexit is hardly the fault of the Das Tyrol
Positive_Review: The staff were so helpful giving recommendations and generally couldnt do enough that is a real treat when you compare against some you encounter

This hotel I would highly Recommend for many reasons value for money Vienna is not cheap the location the exceptional helpful courteous and friendly staff the bedroom the comfortable beds the beautiful cool spring fresh water straight from the taps the cute elevator and much much more We are definitely booking in next time we visit Vienna Wien Congratulations to all the staff who made our stay most memorable

Negative_Review: Room air conditioning not very effective and room was consequently warm to sleep in
Positive_Review: Coffee machine in room with selection of good coffee and teas Staff very helpful friendly

The property is in an excellent location has helpful and friendly staff the property and the rooms are very clean the beds and linens really nice and the artwork is spectacular I would definitely stay here again

The hotel was eclectic with each floor having different art The room full of comforts Each staff person was very helpful and emails answered quickly If you are enjoying Vienna you will enjoy Hotel Tas Dyrol
Great location for visiting the museum quarter shops and within easy walking distance of famous landmarks Very helpful and cheerful reception staff
I loved the extra attention the staff gives you especially Nadine at the front desk She helped me find the right visits and concert tickets It made Vienna an amazing experience

The room and overall hotel was tastefully decorated The bed was comfortable and had a nice blanket The room was also very quiet despite being on the second floor and therefore close to the street Loved the spa

Great location Very nice room Excellent breakfast served by an incredibly pleasant and very hard working woman Front desk staff were pleasant and some were very helpful We will certainly stay there again on our next trip

The lady at the reception who greeted us the first day and checked us out the last day was very helpful and nice the staff was obviously well trained The breakfast exceeded my expectations good quality and variety Colorful cheerful decoration art themed hotel in museums quartier

Negative_Review: Only stayed for three days and never used the spa facility which is a shame
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great especially the omelettes The little touches make this hotel from the welcome Nespresso and Samsung Tab in the rooms and chocolate on the pillows Location is great for the museum quarter and the underground with some lovely restaurants and bars very close by
Breakfast was lovely Loved the variety of the artwork so creative More like a B B than a hotel We loved the cozy lift Room was very quiet

We had a spacious room with top quality furniture linen bed comfort a modern comfortable bathroom and effective air conditioning climate control Breakfast was excellent we enjoyed eggs made to order in addition to a quality continental breakfast Staff was friendly and helpful Although slightly outside the Ringstrasse and Inner City the location on Mariahilfer was terrific It was very close to a concentration of major attractions including the Kunsthistorisches Museum the Hofburg and the Opera House and there is good shopping on Mariahilfer Close by are good restaurants at reasonable prices our favourite was Glacis Beisl recommended by the hotel While superficially the hotel doesn t have a particularly impressive frontage viewed from the street in substance we found it provides a high quality experience at a reasonable price

Negative_Review: I had a hard time getting my room to a comfortable temperature which for me means low
Positive_Review: the front desk staff were very helpful and the location was terrific

Negative_Review: Compared with photos on booking com site actual room size was smaller than I expected Walking distance to the center of Vienna ring was not short
Positive_Review: Staff was very kind and breakfast was good Very close to Leopold museum

Friends of ours stayed here last year and their recommendation convinced us to do the same Everyone throughout the hotel was incredibly helpful and the location is ideal for visiting Vienna we will be recommending this hotel to friends

Negative_Review: The tiniest niggle My husband likes to drink his tea really hot and the Nespresso machine didn t quite get it there But then it is mainly for coffee
Positive_Review: Where to start From the moment we arrived everything was great The Reception staff Gisela Melanie and Nadine were all lovely On arrival we were given a very useful map that gave very good transport information too It was great to help us get around Gisela noticed from my passport that it was my Birthday the day after we arrived We arrived back from our day out to find a lovely fruit flan waiting for us Wi fi in the Hotel is free and I found the reception to be excellent Our room was amazing with everything catered for including a Nespresso Coffee Machine There were chocolates on the pillow each evening and we were given some as a souvenir as we left I don t think I have ever seen such a well stocked mini bar There were plenty of hangers in the wardrobe so we could actually hang up all our clothes This is in my experience rather rare Breakfast was very good Great selection of cheese cold meat pate salads pastries cereals fresh fruit and yoghurt Scrambled boiled or fried eggs could be ordered and omelettes were also available The Hotel is situated a short walk from the U station so we found it very easy to travel around the city It is on a restricted mainly pedestrianised road so there was no noise In fact the Hotel was very quiet Air conditioning was fantastic too and so needed during our stay We had a lovely little private balcony so we could sit with a cuppa and watch the world go by There were free slippers and the use of a bathrobe Throughout the Hotel were examples of varying types of artwork from paintings to glasswork to pottery We would very definitely stay here again if we revisit Vienna which we fully intend to do

Negative_Review: An affordable breakfast would have been appreciated
Positive_Review: Loved this hotel Wonderful in so many ways Strong WIFI Comfortable bed Incredibly convenient location for most major sightseeing Superb staff

Negative_Review: Room is very small so is the elevator Breakfast was good but not great in this trip I strayed over 8 different hotels I rank this breakfast 7
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful front desk and convenient location

Negative_Review: We really needed more AC It was a toasty July week and there wasn t an option to turn it down any lower It would ve been nice to have a bar on site or maybe turn the breakfast room into a light snacks room later in the day
Positive_Review: Das Tyrol was very charming I loved the art on the walls and the color scheme of the entire hotel The staff were very friendly and welcoming and helped us with transfer arrangements and tickets to local concerts Nice sized bathrooms and very clean
The breakfast was very good with lots of choice The reception staff were very helpful with all our queries We loved being able to walk easily to the many attractions of this beautiful city

Good location with a wide range of shops eatery all very close by Very helpful reception staff Comfortable room the Nespresso coffee maker was a good finishing touch Good quality breakfast Will stay here again

Friendly and modern hotel with thirty rooms only six per floor The tips have two fronts and are therefore the best especially those leading to the rear ending in 05 Well located you can go to the city center on foot It takes five minutes to the metro Museumsquartier Station For those who like you have McDonalds and Starbucks near in the same street Clean hotel and spacious room 405 Attentive staff Good breakfast Wi fi works very well in the room Great for those who do not like big hotels
Old but renovated hotel in an excellent location close to downtown Friendly and helpful staff clean everywhere rich and varied breakfast Underground car park opposite the hotel

Negative_Review: The only think I didn t like has nothing to do with this particular hotel I have found it in other European hotels in older buildings To get into the bathtub shower you have to step up I assume some of the piping is under the tub
Positive_Review: I loved everything my stay at Hotel das Tyrol I was able to check in several hours early The staff was friendly and helpful The breakfasts were great The bed and bedding were perfect The hotel is close to the museums Hofburg Palace and the market What can I say I would return again tomorrow
Fabulous hotel A fairly small hotel with the personal touch The staff were wonderful and really helpful and the spa was a real treat after a day of sightseeing

Negative_Review: Sauna was nice we wished there had been a hot tub for the one afternoon we chose to stay in and relax But that might not even be a European thing so we really have nothing negative to say
Positive_Review: Our room was excellent the location of the hotel was excellent and the staff was excellent helpful and accommodating We would definitely recommend this hotel to any friends travelling to Vienna

Negative_Review: The double room was quite small Fine for one person but would have been uncomfortable for two people with luggage As it was I had to move an easy chair to block the desk to open my carry on on the luggage stand
Positive_Review: The staff are exceedingly nice and helpful Breakfast was included in my rate and was an exceptional value Excellent fresh healthy loads of options Interesting and stunning artwork throughout Spacious and sparkling clean bathroom

Negative_Review: Rooms are somewhat small as is the elevator but for a small hotel it was very comfortable
Positive_Review: The staff was exceptional Rooms and bathrooms were very clean and attractive Shower was wonderful

It was a real surprise Exellent hotel Staff very very friendly helpful and kind It is like they thaught about every little detail in this hotel So everything was perfect includeing the location Definitely I ll return to this hotel on my next travel to Vienna

Great location a few blocks from the Hofburg Palace Room was small but comfortable and quiet Staff was very welcoming and friendly and helped with restaurant recommendations and reservations Nice breakfast I would love to stay here again on my next trip to Vienna

Negative_Review: The rooms were a little hot even with the air conditioning on It was hard to open window while sleeping as it was noisy outside but with the window close you couldn t hear a thing
Positive_Review: The hotel was in the most fantastic location for being so central to everything

Negative_Review: The size of the room is ok if you travel on your own otherwise it gets crammed Re breakfast the quality could be better and the choice could be larger
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel and the closeness of public transport The original decoration and the efficiency of the staff The well equipped bathroom and the little spa

Negative_Review: the smell of cigarette smoke was very very strong on each floor despite the no smoking policy in the rooms A part from that everything was perfect
Positive_Review: location was excellent and so was the service

Negative_Review: Cleanless is regarding the carpet Definately needs cleaning or replaced
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful and friendly Afternoon cappuccino and yummies was a very nice treat We had an early flight to the US and they provided an early breakfast for us

The hotel is really cozy and nice It had everything we needed for a short city break Excellent location near the shopping street and city center Very friendly staff Excellent breakfast with custom made ham and cheese omelette plus home made croissants and pastry Spa area with saunas you can book privately without any extra fee were highlights to our long days of shopping and visiting sightseeings We highly recommend this hotel

Negative_Review: room deluxe double was rather small Air conditioning did not work very well
Positive_Review: very friendly comfortable Nice bathroom nice decorations very nice bed Breakfast was good

Negative_Review: The hotel s revolving sign on the street outside lets it down I think because it cheapens the image of a first class operation
Positive_Review: Charming friendly and helpful reception staff Spacious quiet comfortable room with good lighting high quality bedding and pillows a sizeable armchair and a well equipped ensuite bathroom WiFi was reliable and provided a good coverage both in my room and the hotel s common parts Illness prevented my wife from joining me and my bill was very kindly discounted to a single room price even though since my room was not quite ready I ended up with a double The breakfast was of excellent quality with a wide range of food and there was a delicious freshly cooked breakfast available I was only there one night but wished I could have stayed longer An exceptionally well run hotel
The staff were amazing
Everything was excellent
This hotel is really good within walking distance of all the main attractions We had a lovely quiet no smoking room The staff are so helpful
